content: all stitches row 82 k7 k2tog 6 times - 48 sts row 83 knit all stitches row 84 k6 k2tog 6 times - 42 sts row 85 knit all stitches row 86 k5 k2tog 6 times - 36 sts row 87 knit all stitches using polyfil lightly stuff the tree use enough stuffing to keep the tree s shape but not enough to completely stretch out the knitting row 88 k4 k2tog 6 times - 30 sts row 89 k3 k2tog 6 times - 24 sts row 90 k2 k2tog 6 times - 18 sts row 91 k1 k2tog 6 times - 12 sts row 92 k2tog 6 times - 6 sts row 93 k2tog 3 times - 3 sts break yarn and draw it through the 3 remaining stitches to finish the tree designed with intwined pattern studio intwinedstudio com page 3 of 3
